languages.text: Мы начали наступление. Никогда не забуду рев танка, раздирающего гусеницами пехоту еретиков под визжащий клекот лазружей и рокот тяжелой артиллерии. Оглушительная симфония войны.

traits.locale_text: Мы начали наступление. Никогда не забуду рев Леман Расса, раздирающего гусеницами пехоту еретиков, под визжащий клекот лазружей и рокот тяжелой артиллерии. Оглушительная симфония войны.

languages.text: We began our advance. I will never forget the roar of the tank, its treads tearing the heretics' infantry to pieces, accompanied by the shrieks of lasguns and the rumble of heavy artillery. The deafening symphony of war.
languages.original_text: Мы начали наступление. Никогда не забуду рев танка, раздирающего гусеницами пехоту еретиков под визжащий клекот лазружей и рокот тяжелой артиллерии. Оглушительная симфония войны.

traits.locale_text: We began our advance. I will never forget the roar of the tank, its treads tearing the heretics' infantry to pieces, accompanied by the shrieks of lasguns and the rumble of heavy artillery. The deafening symphony of war.

We began our advance. I will never forget the roar of the tank, its treads tearing the heretics' infantry to pieces, accompanied by the shrieks of lasguns and the rumble of heavy artillery. The deafening symphony of war.

We began our advance. I will never forget the roar of the tank, its treads tearing the heretics' infantry to pieces, accompanied by the shrieks of lasguns and the rumble of heavy artillery. The deafening symphony of war.

languages.text: 于是我们开始突击。我永远不会忘记坦克的轰鸣声，它带着不可阻挡的势头，夹杂着激光枪的嘶吼与炮火的隆隆声，将异端分子的步兵撕成了碎片。那真是首震耳欲聋的战争交响曲。
languages.original_text: We began our advance. I will never forget the roar of the tank, its treads tearing the heretics' infantry to pieces, accompanied by the shrieks of lasguns and the rumble of heavy artillery. The deafening symphony of war.

traits.locale_text: 于是我们开始突击。我永远不会忘记坦克的轰鸣声，它带着不可阻挡的势头，夹杂着激光枪的嘶吼与炮火的隆隆声，将异端分子的步兵撕成了碎片。那真是首震耳欲聋的战争交响曲。

languages.text: Nous avons commencé à avancer. Je n'oublierai jamais le rugissement du char, dont les chenilles réduisaient l'infanterie des hérétiques en charpie, sous les sifflements des fusils laser et le grondement de l'artillerie lourde. La symphonie assourdissante de la guerre.
languages.original_text: We began our advance. I will never forget the roar of the tank, its treads tearing the heretics' infantry to pieces, accompanied by the shrieks of lasguns and the rumble of heavy artillery. The deafening symphony of war.

traits.locale_text: Nous avons commencé à avancer. Je n'oublierai jamais le rugissement du char, dont les chenilles réduisaient l'infanterie des hérétiques en charpie, sous les sifflements des fusils laser et le grondement de l'artillerie lourde. La symphonie assourdissante de la guerre.

languages.text: 我々は前進を開始した。戦車の轟音、異端者の歩兵を粉々に引き裂く音、その後に続くラスガンの悲鳴と重砲の音を私は忘れないだろう。鼓膜が潰れるような、戦争のシンフォニーだった。
languages.original_text: We began our advance. I will never forget the roar of the tank, its treads tearing the heretics' infantry to pieces, accompanied by the shrieks of lasguns and the rumble of heavy artillery. The deafening symphony of war.

traits.locale_text: 我々は前進を開始した。戦車の轟音、異端者の歩兵を粉々に引き裂く音、その後に続くラスガンの悲鳴と重砲の音を私は忘れないだろう。鼓膜が潰れるような、戦争のシンフォニーだった。

languages.text: Comenzamos nuestro avance. Nunca olvidaré el rugido del tanque cuando sus orugas despedazaron a la infantería enemiga, acompañadas del coro de rifles láser y el retumbar de la artillería pesada. La sinfonía de la guerra.
languages.original_text: We began our advance. I will never forget the roar of the tank, its treads tearing the heretics' infantry to pieces, accompanied by the shrieks of lasguns and the rumble of heavy artillery. The deafening symphony of war.

traits.locale_text: Comenzamos nuestro avance. Nunca olvidaré el rugido del tanque cuando sus orugas despedazaron a la infantería enemiga, acompañadas del coro de rifles láser y el retumbar de la artillería pesada. La sinfonía de la guerra.

languages.text: Wir begannen unseren Vormarsch. Ich werde niemals das Brüllen des Panzers vergessen, dessen Ketten die Infanterie der Ketzer in Stücke rissen, begleitet vom Kreischen von Lasergewehren und dem Grollen schwerer Artillerie. Die ohrenbetäubende Symphonie des Krieges.
languages.original_text: We began our advance. I will never forget the roar of the tank, its treads tearing the heretics' infantry to pieces, accompanied by the shrieks of lasguns and the rumble of heavy artillery. The deafening symphony of war.

traits.locale_text: Wir begannen unseren Vormarsch. Ich werde niemals das Brüllen des Panzers vergessen, dessen Ketten die Infanterie der Ketzer in Stücke rissen, begleitet vom Kreischen von Lasergewehren und dem Grollen schwerer Artillerie. Die ohrenbetäubende Symphonie des Krieges.

languages.text: İlerlemeye başladık. Silazerin çığlıkları ve ağır topların gümbürtüsü eşliğinde tankın kükreyişini ve kâfirlerin piyade alayını parçalara ayıran dişlerini... Savaşın sağır edici senfonisini sonsuza dek hatırlayacağım.
languages.original_text: We began our advance. I will never forget the roar of the tank, its treads tearing the heretics' infantry to pieces, accompanied by the shrieks of lasguns and the rumble of heavy artillery. The deafening symphony of war.
